metadata.title: CVE-2024-5814 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A malicious TLS1.2 server can force a TLS1.3 client with downgradecapability to use a ciphersuite that it did not agree to and achieve asuccessful connection. This is because, aside from the extensions, theclient was skipping fully parsing the server hello.https://doi.org/10.46586/tches.v2024.i1.457-500

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
